name: log4ym-desktop
description: Log4YM - Amateur Radio Logging Desktop Application

scripts.build:backend:win: dotnet publish ../Log4YM.Server -c Release --self-contained -r win-x64 -o ../Log4YM.Server/bin/Release/net8.0/win-x64/publish && npm run copy:frontend:win
scripts.build:backend:mac-x64: dotnet publish ../Log4YM.Server -c Release --self-contained -r osx-x64 -o ../Log4YM.Server/bin/Release/net8.0/osx-x64/publish && npm run copy:frontend:mac-x64
scripts.build:backend:mac-arm64: dotnet publish ../Log4YM.Server -c Release --self-contained -r osx-arm64 -o ../Log4YM.Server/bin/Release/net8.0/osx-arm64/publish && npm run copy:frontend:mac-arm64
scripts.build:backend:linux: dotnet publish ../Log4YM.Server -c Release --self-contained -r linux-x64 -o ../Log4YM.Server/bin/Release/net8.0/linux-x64/publish && npm run copy:frontend:linux
scripts.package:win: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend:win && electron-builder --win
scripts.package:mac: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend:mac-x64 && npm run build:backend:mac-arm64 && electron-builder --mac
scripts.package:linux: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend:linux && electron-builder --linux
scripts.package:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend:win && npm run build:backend:mac-x64 && npm run build:backend:mac-arm64 && npm run build:backend:linux && electron-builder --win --mac --linux
